data.description: Charter Manufacturing is a fourth-generation family-owned business where our will to grow drives us to do it better. Join the team and become part of our family!Charter Wire is hiring a Business Intelligence & Analytics Intern!At Charter Manufacturing, we believe our culture is our strongest competitive advantage. Join our team, where you’ll take on impactful projects, gain hands-on experience, and grow both personally and professionally.What Sets Our Internship Program Apart:Impactful Work & Growth: Contribute to meaningful projects that drive company goals while developing skills through mentorship, training, and networking.Compensation Benefits: Competitive compensation, receive weekly pay, and paid holidays.Career Advancement: Explore full-time employment opportunities across our four business divisions and corporate office, with adjusted service time if hired after graduation.Recognition & Culture: Join a workplace that celebrates achievements, values contributions, and invests in your future.Program Highlights: Experience our Intern Kickoff Day, Volunteer Opportunities, Professional Development Workshops, and the End of Summer Intern Showcase.Program Structure: Duration/Schedule: Flexible part-time during the school year and full-time during the summer months.Location: HybridStart Date: May 2026What We’re Looking For:Enrollment in a four-year degree program in Business Analytics or a related field with current status of at least a Sophomore level.Cumulative GPA of 2.75 or higher.Proficient in Microsoft Office software: Excel, Word, and PowerPoint.Strong verbal and written communication skills.Strong interpersonal and relationship building skills.Ability to succeed in a team environment.Ability to handle multiple tasks. Preferred Experience: Enrollment in a four-year degree program in Business Analytics or a related field with current status of at least a Sophomore level.Cumulative GPA of 2.75 or higher.Proficient in Microsoft Office software: Excel, Word, and PowerPoint.Strong verbal and written communication skills.Strong interpersonal and relationship building skills.Ability to succeed in a team environment.Ability to handle multiple tasks. What You’ll Focus On:Create Tableau visualizations following governance standards and processes.Suggest potential improvements and new solutions for reporting and analytics to address business needs.Collaborate with business subject matter experts and analysts to provide accurate analytics and visualizations in a timely manner.Assist in various steps throughout the BI Report Creation process such as information gathering.Help ensure that all existing dashboards align with current governance standards.Participate on teams of Digital and business process experts to enhance business processes through the delivery of technologyInvestigate and learn business processes to refine business requirements for technology solutions.Communicate and document requirements, solutions, and project status to business process experts and Digital personnel, according to internal process standardsSupport end-users in day-to-day application troubleshooting #LI-Hybrid#LI-AF1Internship positions are not benefits-eligible.
requirements: Duration/Schedule: Flexible part-time during the school year and full-time during the summer months.
Enrollment in a four-year degree program in Business Analytics or a related field with current status of at least a Sophomore level.
Enrollment in a four-year degree program in Business Analytics or a related field with current status of at least a Sophomore level.
Investigate and learn business processes to refine business requirements for technology solutions.
Communicate and document requirements, solutions, and project status to business process experts and Digital personnel, according to internal process standards
responsibilities: Impactful Work & Growth: Contribute to meaningful projects that drive company goals while developing skills through mentorship, training, and networking.
Program Highlights: Experience our Intern Kickoff Day, Volunteer Opportunities, Professional Development Workshops, and the End of Summer Intern Showcase.
Collaborate with business subject matter experts and analysts to provide accurate analytics and visualizations in a timely manner.
